OOC: I totally hate stomping, it's so unfair.

BIC: Grenade dashes out from under the gestalt and fires back as he
retreats...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 15, 2000 3:55 PM
Subject: Re: UNITE!


> ::War Machine/Zardus::
>
> A huge bot stretches to his full height as the Warmachines finish
combining,
> looking down at the battle. Havoc's wings stuck out of his back, the
missile
> launchers and machine guns shifted to his shoulders. His left arm (Chaos)
had
> two missile launches emerging from the forearm, his right arm (Minion)
> hosting a tank barrel on the wrist. Repressor's copter blades stuck out of
> the ankle of his right foot, bent upward to hug the leg, but with
potential
> to straighten out and cut anything in their path. Demolition's two
> 50-calliber gatling guns were mounted on his left thigh.
>
> A dual missile launcher was held in his hand, made of Repressor's missile
> launchers, with a large barrel in between. THe energy it took to power all
> his weapons drained WarMachine rather quickly, so he could not stay in
> gestalt mode too long.
>
> WarMachine laughs, looking down at Shockaract, firing two missiles and a
> plasma blast from his gun at him while he takes a step forward, his foot
> decending on Grenade.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A shadow passes over Zardus, the Alliance commander glancing sideways to
see
> what was going on. He smiles as he sees WarMachine attacking Shockaract.
One
> more gestalt for the Alliance....
>
> Zardus looks back at Blender, seeing if his slash had hit or not.
>
>
>
>
